title: Interpretation of a dream about lice coming out of hair

preview.html: It also indicates that this person has wronged someone close to him and does not intend to do so, and there are many interpretations that we will explain from a translator’s website. Interpretation of seeing lice coming out of an unmarried girl’s hair: This interpretation says that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that lice is coming out of her hair. It indicates This dream indicates that this girl will leave her life with someone she loves. This also indicates the final exit of this person from her life. After he discovered that he had an enjoyable relationship with her without honesty and true love. But when an unmarried girl sees in her dream that her hair is full of lice. This indicates This dream indicates that there are companions in her life who have bad morals. It also suggests that this single girl should leave them and stay away from them before she gets into trouble. And if the girl sees in her dream that a lot of lice are falling from her hair while she is sleeping and she cannot get them out. This indicates that this girl will face A lot of bad circumstances, sadness, anxiety, and a lot of problems, and this can lead to abandoning this estate for many people. There is another interpretation that says if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that lice are falling from her hair. This vision indicates that this girl will delay her marriage. She must remain confident in herself. Also, this dream indicates that God Almighty will grant her a sweet share and goodness will come to her in the coming period. See also: Interpretation of seeing lice in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqInterpretation of seeing lice falling from the hair in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees it in her dream That a lot of lice is coming out of her hair, and they are next to her in bed. This dream indicates that this married woman will get a lot of money. It also indicates that he will achieve what he wants without getting tired. There is an interpretation that says: If a married woman sees lice coming out of her hair in her dream This vision shows that he has gone through many problems and that he can get rid of them. This vision also shows that this married woman is always confident of herself, despite all the problems and bad circumstances that she is exposed to. But when the married woman sees in her dream that a lot of lice are coming out of Her hair and spread throughout her clothes. This vision indicates that he will reach sophistication and a high position. This dream also indicates that someone is trying to get close to her. Her own interests will be fulfilled from the beginning of their relationship. There is another interpretation that says that if a married woman sees in her dream that she herself The brush is used to remove lice from her hair. This indicates that this married woman will succeed and excel in all the tests she embarks on, even if there are many competitors. The interpretation of seeing lice coming out of the hair in a dream about the man and its meaningWhen the married man sees in his dream that there are many Of lice coming out of his hair, and this lice is spreading in his house in abundance. This dream indicates that this man was unable to provide for the needs of his house. He was not able to manage his house and did not perform his duties at home to the fullest extent. There is an interpretation that says: If a married man dreams that Lice came out of his hair. He was at work and after he left, he was ashamed

title: Interpretation of a dream about marrying a close person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of marrying a close person in a dream Scientists give different meanings to what you see, so we present in the following lines the interpretation of the dream of marrying a close person in a dream, all this and more details that interest you..Interpretation of the dream of marrying a close person in a dreamInterpretation of the dream of marrying someone A close relative in a dream and marrying a familiar person could be a sign of his love, and God knows the unseen. In the event that the dreamer dreams of marrying a familiar person, this may lead to him falling in love and hiding his feelings, and God knows the unseen. In the event that an unmarried girl sees herself marrying a relative, this may be good news, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about marriage without desire in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marriage without desire in a dream could be a sign of rejection of a job or work, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a forced marriage, this may indicate his rejection of a job, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried girl sees a forced marriage, this may indicate To responsibility, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about marrying someone I do not know in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about marrying someone I do not know in a dream could be a sign of nourishment, and God knows best. When you see a single girl getting married to someone you do not know, this can lead to goodness and livelihood, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. If the dreamer dreams that he is marrying someone he does not know, this may be a sign of success and elevation, and God knows best. When an unmarried girl sees herself marrying someone she does not know, she can express that God is protecting her from all harm, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover In a dream, interpretation of a dream about not marrying a lover in a dream, we did not find specific meanings to see this, but refusal to marry can lead to psychological problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see denial of preaching, it can lead to psychological crises, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also express a rejection of some nature, and God knows the unseen. Where if a married woman sees herself marrying my husband, this may lead to good circumstances with her husband, and God knows the unseen. When a married woman sees herself marrying her husband, it may lead This is due to his love for her, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It may also indicate the wife’s pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a friend in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a friend in a dream could be a sign of kindness, and God knows best. Whereas if the dreamer sees himself marrying a friend in a dream, it may express interests. Shared, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. When you see an unmarried girl marrying a friend, it may be beneficial, and God knows the unseen. If an unmarried young man sees himself in a dream marrying his girlfriend, this may be evidence of his feelings for her, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about marrying an evil person in In a dream, we did not find clear explanations for marrying an evil person. However, seeing an evil person in a dream could be a sign that you are thinking about him, and God knows the unseen, as he can show that he is thinking about his actions, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. title: Interpretation of red roses in a dream

preview.html: We offer you the interpretation of red roses in a dream. There are many interpretations of red roses by interpreters, some of them saw that they indicate good and urgent news, and some of them saw that they show intense anger, but most of the interpretations of red roses in a dream are good news of the imminence of success, the birth of a child, or the return of an expatriate or traveler. For more details, follow us in the encyclopedia. Interpretation Red roses in a dream: If a person sees in a dream that he is giving red roses to someone, then this indicates the great affection and love that he has for him. However, if he sees that he is giving his enemies red roses, then this indicates his extreme anger at that enemy, and the intention is to harm him so that he will not be wronged. He dreamed that he was picking roses, as this indicates the coming of goodness and good news, God willing. And if he saw red roses on the tree, this indicates that he will be born soon, God willing. Also, red roses in a dream may indicate the return of expatriates. It could also indicate kissing a woman with a beautiful face. Red if he sees himself kissing red roses in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about red roses for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees red roses with thorns in her dream, this means that she will be snatched from suitors and she must choose carefully. Also, seeing red roses for unmarried women may indicate the presence of An evil person in her life may want to harm her. Interpretation of a dream about red roses for a married woman. If a married woman sees that her husband has given her a red rose in her dream, this indicates his intense love for her. But if in reality there was a dispute between them and she saw him giving him a red rose, this indicates his anger. Towards her, he must start greeting this rose. And if she sees that she is giving her husband a red rose, this indicates that the relationship between them will improve, God willing. To interpret a new dream, you can enter the Instant Dream Interpretation Application. This was our discussion about the interpretation of red roses in a dream. Follow us on Encyclopedia to get all the news as long as you are safe.

title: Seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: Seeing a tiger in a dream for a single woman: The tiger is considered a predatory animal and is known for its courage and ability to hit the target with great accuracy. What is the benefit of seeing it? This dream carries many connotations that differ depending on the color of the tiger. It can be white or black and it can pursue or harm you. Different. Seeing a tiger in a dream for an unmarried woman in Ibn Shaheen. Seeing a tiger in a dream for a person represents seriousness and strictness, applying the laws literally and honest dealings that may leave Others have the impression that the speaker is a person without feeling and is characterized by alienation and coldness. If an unmarried girl sees a tiger, this indicates the many battles she is fighting in her life and the conflicts that if she is able to free herself from, she will have achieved many desired goals and objectives. The dream can be an indication of The presence of a man who desires one woman and follows her every step of the way, and wants to seduce her and take advantage of her. And if you see a tiger girl watching her, this indicates a person who wants to change her beliefs and ideas and normalize her with other ideas and principles that do not fit with what she was raised on. And if she sees that she is fighting the tiger and fighting him, this indicates On stings or words that insult her modesty or the cruelty of some towards her, especially the one who heads her and supervises her affairs. But if she hears the voice of a tiger, this symbolizes the anxiety and fear that surrounds her stomach because of a certain man who is the main factor that prevents her from living normally. Seeing a tiger in a dream For a single woman in Imam Al-Sadiq, the tiger is the cunning and stubborn enemy whose entire work is limited to conspiring, harming others, and striving to achieve self-interest at the expense of higher and collective interests. If an unmarried woman sees that she is riding a tiger, this indicates her agility and ability to control the course of things and obtain a distinguished position in the world. The environment in which you live. Seeing a tiger in a dream shows a single woman that she will rise in position, achieve many successes, achieve a high and high degree, and achieve goals in the coming period. Ibn Shaheen believes that if the tiger does not symbolize the enemy or oppression, then seeing it is evidence of abundant nutrition. And achieving many material gains in the near future. If a girl sees that she is afraid of a tiger and cannot approach it, this indicates a reconsideration of some of the offers made to her, and the dream may be a sign of separation, decision, and cancellation of the marriage ceremony. Interpretation of a dream about a single tiger by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says, In the interpretation of seeing a tiger in a dream for an unmarried woman, the connotations of seeing a lion are the same as those expressed in seeing a tiger. And if an unmarried girl sees a tiger in her dream, this shows a greedy man who is working hard to get her by changing her beliefs and spreading doubts in her heart. And he pulled her back so that she could not stand and achieve this quest. Seeing a tiger in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin indicates false love, relationships doomed to failure, and a lot of deception and disappointments in her life. And if she sees something of a tiger that frightens and frightens her, this is an indication

If she sees something from the tiger that scares her and frightens her, this is an indication

title: Interpretation of a dream about a brother’s death by Ibn Sirin and senior scholars

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother: Death is one of the tragedies that occur every day, and the causes are different, and death is the same, and we all return to God, as stated in the Holy Qur’an in the Almighty’s saying: (Whoever is tested). *And Matt hears the face of your Lord, the Almighty, the Majestic, and the reality of the person there), of course he will be shocked, and when the dreamer sees the death of his brother in a dream, he will. You will inevitably be shocked and want to know the interpretation, so in this article we look at the most important things that the commentators said, so follow us....! Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother. Commentators believe that seeing a brother assassinated by someone and not dying symbolizes that he will bear witness in the path of God and that God will grant goodness. If the dreamer sees her brother dead in her dream, this symbolizes getting rid of enemies and harming them. Also, if a dreamer sees a sick person in a dream whose brother has died, this portends a quick recovery and getting rid of fatigue and pain. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream the death of the older brother while he is crying Loudly, this indicates the abundance of livelihood that he will receive soon. If a man sees his brother dying in a dream, he will soon obtain a lot of money and will soon change the course of his life. If the dreamer commits many sins and disobedience and sees in a dream the death of his brother, he will repent to God. As for the woman who saw the death of her brother in a dream and started screaming, this indicates that in reality she is suffering from the presence of people trying to harm her but they are unable to do so. If the dreamer sees in a dream people crying for his brother, this means that in reality he will suffer from severe envy. Interpretation of a dream about death Brother by Ibn Sirin The prominent scholar Ibn Sirin claims that the death of a brother in a dream does not mean that this will happen in reality, but it is a good omen to get rid of enemies and harm them. Also, for the dreamer to see his sick brother dying at the hands of God in a dream indicates his speedy recovery and freedom from health problems. As for the lady who sees her older brother dead in her dream, this symbolizes that she will be exposed to great harm at that time. The dreamer who saw in his dream that her older brother died and began to scream loudly, symbolizes the abundant sustenance that she will soon receive. The lady’s vision of the dying brother in a dream symbolizes To the money that she will receive soon and the course of her life will change. If the girl’s father dies and she sees the death of her brother in a dream, this indicates the loss of the bond and a return to her life. A woman if she sees her younger brother dead in her dream indicates victory over competitors in reality. If the dreamer is sick and sees In a dream, his dead brother kisses him, this means that he will go through a difficult time and the illness will get worse for him. Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother for a single woman. Commentators say: Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream means the death of her traveling brother, so it will improve her and make her live abundantly. Also, seeing a sick dreamer in a dream Her brother died means recovery from illness, recovery, and enjoyment of good health. If the dreamer sees in a dream that her older brother has died, this indicates that she will be exposed to great harm in her life. If an unmarried woman sees the death of her brother in an accident in her dream, this indicates marriage.

You will inevitably be shocked and want to know the interpretation, so in this article we look at the most important things that the commentators said, so follow us....! Interpretation of a dream about the death of a brother. Commentators believe that seeing a brother assassinated by someone and not dying symbolizes that he will bear witness in the path of God and that God will grant goodness. If the dreamer sees her brother dead in her dream, this symbolizes getting rid of enemies and harming them. Also, if a dreamer sees a sick person in a dream whose brother has died, this portends a quick recovery and getting rid of fatigue and pain. As for the dreamer who sees in a dream the death of the older brother while he is crying Loudly, this indicates the abundance of livelihood that he will receive soon. If a man sees his brother dying in a dream, he will soon obtain a lot of money and will soon change the course of his life. If the dreamer commits many sins and disobedience and sees in a dream the death of his brother, he will repent to God. As for the woman who saw the death of her brother in a dream and started screaming, this indicates that in reality she is suffering from the presence of people trying to harm her but they are unable to do so. If the dreamer sees in a dream people crying for his brother, this means that in reality he will suffer from severe envy. title: Interpretation of seeing a green lizard in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a green lizard in a dream by Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, Ibn Kathir, and Imam Al-Sadiq. Scientists and jurists interpreted dreams and visions through the vision website roy2a.com as saying that seeing a lizard in a dream is a bad thing. Dreams that symbolize evil and evil for the dreamer, so we will talk about the interpretation of this dream for single girls, married women, pregnant women, men, young men, and divorced women. What is the interpretation of seeing a green lizard in a dream for a single girl? A single girl sees a green lizard in a dream. Make acquaintances with naughty friends and they will plan harm and evil against her. Girl A single woman who sees a gray lizard in a dream is a sign that he made wrong decisions in his life and destiny and the failure of her romantic relationship. See also: Interpretation of seeing a lizard’s hole in a dream. What is the interpretation of a married woman who sees a lizard in a dream? A married woman seeing a lizard in a dream. Its green color is a sign that she has achieved A large part of her dreams and desires. A married woman sees a green lizard in a dream, indicating that it brings her goodness, nourishment, and blessings. A married woman sees a lizard in the sky. M symbolizes the emergence of many positive changes in her life and their change for the better. See also: Interpretation of seeing an animal’s brain in a dream. What is the interpretation A man who sees a lizard in a dream? A man who sees a lizard in a dream. Killing it is a sign of victory over his enemies and God’s satisfaction with them. Seeing a man killing a lizard in a dream is an indication of the world’s respect and love for him and his good reputation among them. A man who sees a lizard in a dream is an indication of the strength of his character and his ability to distinguish what is right. And error. What is the interpretation of a pregnant woman who sees a lizard in a dream? Seeing a pregnant woman from a lizard in a dream is a sign of safety and ease of childbirth. Seeing a red lizard in a dream is a warning against aborting the child and putting it in danger. Seeing a black lizard in a dream is an indication of her care for a good child, and bringing abundant goodness. See Also: Interpretation of seeing animal blood in a dream. What is the interpretation of a young man who sees a lizard in a dream? A young man sees a lizard in a dream and trying to kill it and get rid of it shows that he has gained full rights from his enemies. A young man seeing a lizard in a dream indicates his strength, vitality, vitality, and the loss of sadness and anxiety from his life. Seeing a lizard Black in a dream is a sign of his livelihood with a good boy, and a green lizard indicates a good girl. A young man sees a lizard in a dream and it indicates the provision of a good girl, high morals and extremist religion. What is the interpretation of seeing a green lizard in a dream? Seeing a green lizard in a dream is one of the good visions that indicate The coming of comfort, joy, and release from all sadness. Dreaming of eating lizards is a sign of abundant nutrition, the strength of love, and the relationship between spouses. See also: Interpretation of seeing a turtle in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing a colorful lizard in a dream? Seeing a colorful lizard in a dream is a sign of staying away from danger, getting close to God, and intense love for goodness. Seeing a colored chameleon in a man’s dream is a sign of the abundance of deceivers and liars in the dreamer’s life, and a change in his circumstances for the worse. What is Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of seeing a war?

title: Interpretation of seeing my deceased grandfather in a dream and its consequences

preview.html: The interpretation of seeing my deceased grandfather in a dream and seeing a dead person in general is one of the visions that worries many people, as it includes many different explanations and interpretations, based on these details and scenes that we see in the dream. Among them are the same good and promising interpretations, including unpromising interpretations, and in this context we will explain to you the interpretation of seeing my deceased grandfather in a dream.Interpretation of seeing my deceased grandfather in a dreamMany interpreters, scholars, and jurists have tried to clarify the meanings and consequences of these dreams, as they may convey good news to God or It may be unfavorable, and accordingly we will explain to you in the following lines the interpretation of my vision. The dead grandfather in a dream: In the case of seeing the dead grandfather in a dream, according to the scholar Ibn Sirin. It is an indication of the extent of the feeling of longing and longing for him, and what he missed. In addition, if one sees in a dream his deceased grandfather. This dream is evidence that he He puts in a lot of effort to achieve all the ambitions and achievements he seeks. Also, seeing a deceased grandfather in a dream, and in reality he felt very tired due to illness. This is evidence of the approaching time of his meeting with God Almighty. Also, if a person sees in a dream his deceased grandfather and his appearance is bad in A dream. This vision is evidence that he will encounter many problems, obstacles, and crises in his life. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing a handsome man in a dream for a married and single woman. Interpretation of a dream about my deceased grandfather talking to me. It is possible that this vision is between good and righteous, because the grandfather has a great place in our hearts, and he has It is considered a bad vision, based on the details it contains, and many commentators who have contributed. To clarify its concepts, in this context, we explain to you the interpretation of the dream of my deceased grandfather talking to me, which is: The interpretation of seeing the deceased grandfather speaking to me in a dream. This is evidence that the dreamer is trying hard to achieve all his personal dreams and ambitions. While the grandfather saw in the dream that she is smiling at him. This dream is evidence However, the person having the vision is a good person who fears God in worldly and religious matters. However, if he sees the grandfather in the wrong way, this vision is evidence of his falling into problems and worries. This vision could also be a sign of the death of any sick person in the family, and God Almighty knows best. See also: I dreamed that I found gold and took it to the top interpreters for married and single women. Seeing my dead grandfather in a single woman’s dream. It should be noted that the dreams that we see in a dream may be similar but differ in the interpretations they contain, depending on the social status of the person who sees this dream and based on that we will explain to you In the following lines, the interpretation of seeing a dead grandfather in an unmarried woman’s dream is: If the deceased grandfather is seen in a dream of a single girl. This dream is an indication that he will obtain a lot of goodness and a lot of sustenance. Likewise, if the unmarried girl sees the deceased grandfather and holds his hand. This dream is an indication of the approaching happy event for the dreamer, which is either an engagement or marriage. In addition, if she sees an unmarried

title: Seeing a handsome male child in a married woman’s dream

preview.html: But what about seeing the handsome boy? This is what we learn in our article today, according to the hadiths of leading interpretation scholars. Interpretation of seeing a handsome child in a dream for one girl: The appearance of a fully formed male child in the dream of an unmarried girl who has never been married before. It is a sign of good luck and goodness that she will gain. And the girl who suffers from many problems in Her life, and she saw a handsome boy, and she was crying in her dream. It is good news for her to get rid of these problems, comfort her, and enter a new phase in her life full of happiness. Seeing a male camel child in a single girl’s dream. It shows that she will soon marry a good man who will be a source of happiness and security in her life. Her life. An unmarried girl who saw herself breastfeeding a male child was beautiful in appearance in a dream. It is a good sign that she will receive a promotion in her job. The vision also means that she will marry a certain young man she loves, but after a period full of difficulties. See also: Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing a child Beautiful in a dream. Interpretation of seeing a handsome child in a dream for a married woman. The appearance of a handsome boy in a married woman’s dream. It is a sign of peace of mind, security, and a happy and stable life with the husband. A married woman dreams of a handsome child entering her house in a dream. It is a sign that goodness is coming to her and a harbinger of hearing good news. The vision may mean pregnancy for a married woman who is delaying childbearing, and God knows best. A married woman sees herself sitting with a handsome child in a dream. This dream means that he will find a suitable job. As for the one who dreams that she is walking with a child in the dream, and she was smiling and happy with him. It is a metaphorical expression of her desire. In childbearing, and that God Almighty will grant her a beautiful child, and God knows best. The appearance of a handsome boy in a married woman’s dream while he is in the arms of her husband. It is a token of her husband’s love for her. Interpretation of seeing a beautiful male child in a dream about the man and its meaning. A married man sees that he is sitting with a beautiful child and talking to him. Happily in the dream. This means that there is a strong relationship of respect between the monarch and his son in reality. It also indicates that the dreamer will achieve all his goals and desires. A man enters the mosque accompanied by a beautiful child in a dream. It is a sign of the dreamer’s strong faith and closeness to God Almighty. Seeing a man Handsome in a man’s dream, symbolizes blessings, happiness, and goodness in the dreamer’s home. Seeing a beautiful child entering the house with a man during a dream. It is a sign of the collapse of anxiety, the end of problems, and a metaphor for peace of mind. A man sees himself walking next to a beautiful male child in a dream. It is a metaphor for good luck. For the pioneer. The meaning of seeing a beautiful baby girl in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman holding the hand of a handsome child in a dream, and she was in the last months of pregnancy. It is a sign of the approaching date of birth and the health and safety of the fetus. Perhaps the vision indicates an easy birth. The appearance of a handsome man in a woman’s dream A pregnant woman indicates kindness, sustenance, and blessings for the dreamer after giving birth. It also means that the fortune teller will go through the pregnancy period without pain or health problems, God willing. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about many children playing. Interpretation of seeing a handsome male child in a dream for young men and its meaningWhen an unmarried young man dreams of seeing a child

title: Interpretation of the dream of engagement in a dream and the dream interpretation of engagement by someone I do not know according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about engaging in a dream: This dream carries many good indications due to the happiness that the dreamer or the woman sees in the dream, or an expression of the state of joy that accompanies a person when he goes through this event in his real life, and in the following lines we will do. Some cases of these impressions appear related to the interpretation of the dream of engagement, which are correct and it is the degree of their validity under the changing circumstances. Interpretation of the dream of engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin What is the interpretation of the dream of getting engaged in a dream? In general, getting engaged in the dreamer’s dream indicates work in this world and one’s effort In it, and according to the fortuneteller’s condition about himself in a dream of pleasure and joy, there is an interpretation that he will gain goodness and attain desire in this world. If the dreamer sees repeatedly in the dream that he is seeking his proposal to a married woman who knows or knows her husband, then this is an indication of his bad choices and the need to re Consider what he is doing in his life or planning for his future. Dreaming of an engagement in a dream is an indication of the dreamer’s condition in the period following the vision. It brings goodness to him, or it is a sign of evil, depending on the state of happiness or sadness that appears in the dream. Interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Sirin has several interpretations, each of which depends on the condition of the dreamer and the woman he marries. If the fortuneteller gets married and sees in a dream that he is engaged to his wife, this dream was a bad omen for him of a great financial loss or loss of his status among his people, because he was respected among them. But if the dreamer is a man And a beautiful woman proposed to him and he was happy in his dream, as there are elements of happiness in this world and good behavior among people. If a person sees in a dream that he is engaged to one of his relatives such as his sister or mother, this is evidence that he will commit sins and misdeeds, and it may also indicate tribulations and troubles that he will be exposed to. To reach For the most accurate interpretation of your dream, Google the Egyptian dream interpretation site, which includes thousands of interpretations from leading interpretive scholars. Interpretation of a dream about engagement in a dream for a girl: Seeing a young girl dreaming is an indication of the change that her life will witness in the near future, and in most cases it will be a change for the better and will bring her Goodness and prosperity. If a girl sees that she is engaged in a dream easily, this indicates that she will soon marry a man who has a high status and an important position. Being engaged in a dream for an unmarried woman is evidence of the large amounts of money that she will earn and may indicate her success and superiority if she is still Student. Interpretation of dreams to participate in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is engaged to a man unknown to her, then this dream has significance, either that she will soon enter into an emotional relationship that will end with marriage to a good man whom she fears. God is within her, or it may be good news for her that things will be facilitated for her and she will be supported. Interpretation of a dream about a single woman’s engagement by someone she knows. If an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is engaged to the man she loves, this indicates his good intentions and his attempt to reach her.
